name: Chat with your CSV
desc: Built a LangChain-powered Streamlit app that lets users query CSV files using natural language with Gemini/DeepSeek integration and real-time schema detection.

name: Indian Movie Analysis
desc: Created an interactive Streamlit dashboard to visualize Bollywood movie trends by year and genre using Plotly. Included rating and revenue analytics.

name: BikeWale Web Scraper
desc: Built a web scraping tool using BeautifulSoup and requests to extract bike specifications and prices from BikeWale. Cleaned and exported data for analysis.

name: Virtual Voice Assistant (JARVIS)
desc: Developed a Gemini-integrated voice assistant with speech recognition, system control, and text-to-speech capabilities for hands-free operations.
